entry.data:
SNOW
SNOW ACCUMULATION AROUND AN INCH
COLD
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 13
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW 90 PERCENT
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 1 BELOW

SNOW
SNOW MAY BE HEAVY AT TIMES AFTER MIDNIGHT
NEW SNOW ACCUMULATION OF 4 TO 6 INCHES
COLD
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 12
NORTHEAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW NEAR 100 PERCENT
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 1 BELOW AFTER MIDNIGHT

SNOW
STORM TOTAL SNOW ACCUMULATION OF 8 TO 12 INCHES
HIGHS AROUND 16
NORTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW NEAR 100 PERCENT
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 2 BELOW

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 3 BELOW
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 9 BELOW

SUNNY, COLD WITH HIGHS AROUND 15
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 13 BELOW IN THE MORNING

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND ZERO
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S

PARTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS ZERO TO 5 ABOVE ZERO

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 20S
LOWS AROUND ZERO

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND ZERO
HIGHS AROUND 20
